ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] A simple thank you
ygData.msgSnippet: Sweet! If you were on The Tribunal I would buff you up and protect you with my lvl 52 cleric to help you kill that little rat bastard! luv, -Su
ygData.messageBody:
Sweet! If you were on The Tribunal I would buff you up and protect you with
my lvl 52 cleric to help you kill that little rat bastard!
luv,
-Su

> Hi gang,
> I just wanted to take a moment and thank any and all of you on this list
> I may have come across during my Warrior's, (Genmay), travels to and
> from Ak'Anon and Felwith. The SOW's were perfect, it makes the trips so
> much faster! As for the extra buffs those were wonderful too! Lately
> I've had a thing going on with a large plagued rat over in Steamfront
> who seems to find me every time and kills me! With the buffs I can make
> it to the gates of the city and the guards take care of him. I swear
> when I get a couple of levels higher I'm going to defeat that darn rat!
> ;-)
>
> Happy hunting!
> Durgaa: 9th level Wood Elf Ranger
> Shizney: 5th level Gnome Mage
> Genmay: 6th level Gnome Warrior
>
>
>
>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
